text: Falao zu zhong yige mimi gui xin de xinshi shuo:“Yige ren ba cong nimen de zhu fachu de mingzheng zhaoshi nimen, bing shuo:‘Wo de zhu shi an la’, nimen jiu yao shalu ta ma? Ruguo ta shi yige shuohuang zhe, namo, ta zi shou huangyan zhi hai; ruguo ta shi yige chengshi zhe, namo, tasuoyong yi donghe nimen de zainan, jiang you yibufen lailin nimen, an la biding bu yindao guofen de chang shuohuangyan zhe
